entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries over southern sections near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 31 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
